data.title: Every NBA player expected to compete in Paris Olympics
data.meta_description: Check out the NBA players expected to suit up for USA, Canada, Australia and other countries during the Paris Olympics this summer.
data.text:
• Download the NBA App

• 2024 Olympics: Complete coverage

• Record number of current and former NBA, WNBA players in Olympics

The Men’s Basketball Tournament at the 2024 Paris Olympics will be filled with NBA talent. Below is a country-by-country look at the current and former NBA players expected to compete.

Note: As of July 25, 2024 (all rosters subject to change)

United States

Bam Adebayo (Heat)

Devin Booker (Suns)

Stephen Curry (Warriors)

Anthony Davis (Lakers)

Kevin Durant (Suns)

Anthony Edwards (Timberwolves)

Joel Embiid (76ers)

Tyrese Haliburton (Pacers)

Jrue Holiday (Celtics)

LeBron James (Lakers)

Jayson Tatum (Celtics)

Derrick White (Celtics)

Canada

Nickeil Alexander-Walker (Timberwolves)

RJ Barrett (Raptors)

Khem Birch (former NBA player)

Dillon Brooks (Rockets)

Luguentz Dort (Thunder)

Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (Thunder)

Trey Lyles (Kings)

Jamal Murray (Nuggets)

Andrew Nembhard (Pacers)

Kelly Olynyk (Raptors)

Dwight Powell (Mavericks)

France

Nicolas Batum (Clippers)

Bilal Coulibaly (Wizards)

Nando De Colo (former NBA player)

Evan Fournier (most recently with Pistons)

Rudy Gobert (Timberwolves)

Frank Ntilikina (former NBA player)

Victor Wembanyama (Spurs)

Guerschon Yabusele (former NBA player)

Australia

Dyson Daniels (Hawks)

Matthew Dellavedova (former NBA player)

Dante Exum (Mavericks)

Josh Giddey (Bulls)

Josh Green (Hornets)

Joe Ingles (Timberwolves)

Jock Landale (Rockets)

Patty Mills (most recently with Heat)

Duop Reath (Trail Blazers)

Serbia

Bogdan Bogdanovic (Hawks)

Marko Gudurić (former NBA player)

Nikola Jokic (Nuggets)

Nikola Jovic (Heat)

Dennis Schroder (Nets)

Daniel Theis (Pelicans)

Franz Wagner (Magic)

Mo Wagner (Magic)

Spain

Alex Abrines (former NBA player)

Santi Aldama (Grizzlies)

Lorenzo Brown (former NBA player)

Rudy Fernández (former NBA player)

Usman Garuba (most recently with Warriors)

Juancho Hernangómez (former NBA player)

Willy Hernangómez (former NBA player)

Greece

Kostas Antetokounmpo (former NBA player)

Nick Calathes (former NBA player)

Japan
